summary: The 'Ecosystem Architecture' series explores the evolution of ecosystems from biology to broader applications. It examines how the concept has expanded beyond physical boundaries, especially in the digital age. The series introduces ecosystem architecture as a novel approach for designing and nurturing decentralized organizations, drawing insights from various disciplines to create thriving, interconnected systems that span space and time.
excerpt: Exploring the evolution of "ecosystem" from biology to broader fields, this series introduces ecosystem architecture as a new approach for designing thriving decentralized organizations in the digital age.
